title: Political stability - countries
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Index Value in the y axis.
The Index Value is appeared to be the highest at Country Oman and lowest at Country Norway.
There is a difference of 2.7 between the maximum Country Oman and minimum Country Norway.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Index Value in the y axis.
The Index Value is appeared to be the highest at Country Oman and lowest at Country Norway.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Index Value in the y axis.
The Index Value is appeared to be the highest at Country Oman and lowest at Country Norway.

max_summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Index Value in each Country on the y axis.
The Index Value is highest at Country Oman and lowest at Country Norway.
Second maximum Index Value is found at Country Slovenia.
The highest Country Oman has 2.7 more Index Value than the lowest Country Norway.
Country Oman is higher than any other Countrys with value 3.9, followed by Slovenia, and Slovenia. Down to Country Norway with the lowest value 1.2.
Similar Index Value is found in Country Australia, Austria, Luxembourg, and New Zealand.
The Country Oman has 1.18 times more Index Value than average.
The Index Value is 56.4 if we add up values of all Countrys.
